TI: [The enhancement of glutamate release in the nucleus accumbens of rats with a destroyed hippocampal formation during an emotional conditioned response].
AB: It was shown by means of in vivo microdialysis combined with HPLC/EC analysis that the exocytotoxic lesions of the hippocampal formation impaired the emotional conditioning and led to additional glutamate release in the n. accumbens during acquisition and performance of the conditioned response. Thus, it was shown that the disruption of glutamatergic synaptic transmission in the n. accumbens results in a compensatory increase in the volume glutamatergic transmission in this structure.
AD: Pavlov Institute of Physiology, Russian Academy of Sciences, St.-Petersburg.
TT: Usilenie vybrosa glutamata v prilezhashchem iadre u krys s razrushennoi gippokampal'noi formatsiei v khode emotsional'nogo uslovnogo otveta.
TA: Zh Vyssh Nerv Deiat Im I P Pavlova
JT: Zhurnal vysshei nervnoi deiatelnosti imeni I P Pavlova
SO: Zh Vyssh Nerv Deiat Im I P Pavlova. 1999 Mar-Apr;49(2):245-53.
